27 
28 import rospy
29 
30 import baxter_interface
31 
32 from baxter_interface import CHECK_VERSION
33 
34 
35 class JointRecorder(object):
36  def __init__(self, filename, rate):
37  """
38  Records joint data to a file at a specified rate.
39  """
40  self._filename = filename
41  self._raw_rate = rate
42  self._rate = rospy.Rate(rate)
43  self._start_time = rospy.get_time()
44  self._done = False
45 
46  self._limb_left = baxter_interface.Limb("left")
47  self._limb_right = baxter_interface.Limb("right")
48  self._gripper_left = baxter_interface.Gripper("left", CHECK_VERSION)
49  self._gripper_right = baxter_interface.Gripper("right", CHECK_VERSION)
50  self._io_left_lower = baxter_interface.DigitalIO('left_lower_button')
51  self._io_left_upper = baxter_interface.DigitalIO('left_upper_button')
52  self._io_right_lower = baxter_interface.DigitalIO('right_lower_button')
53  self._io_right_upper = baxter_interface.DigitalIO('right_upper_button')
54 
55  # Verify Grippers Have No Errors and are Calibrated
56  if self._gripper_left.error():
57  self._gripper_left.reset()
58  if self._gripper_right.error():
59  self._gripper_right.reset()
60  if (not self._gripper_left.calibrated() and
61  self._gripper_left.type() != 'custom'):
62  self._gripper_left.calibrate()
63  if (not self._gripper_right.calibrated() and
64  self._gripper_right.type() != 'custom'):
65  self._gripper_right.calibrate()
66 
67  def _time_stamp(self):
68  return rospy.get_time() - self._start_time
69 
70  def stop(self):
71  """
72  Stop recording.
73  """
74  self._done = True
75 
76  def done(self):
77  """
78  Return whether or not recording is done.
79  """
80  if rospy.is_shutdown():
81  self.stop()
82  return self._done
83 
84  def record(self):
85  """
86  Records the current joint positions to a csv file if outputFilename was
87  provided at construction this function will record the latest set of
88  joint angles in a csv format.
89 
90  This function does not test to see if a file exists and will overwrite
91  existing files.
92  """
93  if self._filename:
94  joints_left = self._limb_left.joint_names()
95  joints_right = self._limb_right.joint_names()
96  with open(self._filename, 'w') as f:
97  f.write('time,')
98  f.write(','.join([j for j in joints_left]) + ',')
99  f.write('left_gripper,')
100  f.write(','.join([j for j in joints_right]) + ',')
101  f.write('right_gripper\n')
102 
103  while not self.done():
104  # Look for gripper button presses
105  if self._io_left_lower.state:
106  self._gripper_left.open()
107  elif self._io_left_upper.state:
108  self._gripper_left.close()
109  if self._io_right_lower.state:
110  self._gripper_right.open()
111  elif self._io_right_upper.state:
112  self._gripper_right.close()
113  angles_left = [self._limb_left.joint_angle(j)
114  for j in joints_left]
115  angles_right = [self._limb_right.joint_angle(j)
116  for j in joints_right]
117 
118  f.write("%f," % (self._time_stamp(),))
119 
120  f.write(','.join([str(x) for x in angles_left]) + ',')
121  f.write(str(self._gripper_left.position()) + ',')
122 
123  f.write(','.join([str(x) for x in angles_right]) + ',')
124  f.write(str(self._gripper_right.position()) + '\n')
125 
126  self._rate.sleep()
